Barrydale Karoo Lodge

Barrydale Karoo Lodge

Boutique comfort in the heart of Route 62

Discover a haven of relaxation, fine dining, and authentic Karoo charm

Our Accommodations

Choose from our 11 uniquely designed rooms, each offering authentic Karoo charm and modern comfort

Standard Twin Room

Aloe Ferox

A cozy twin room designed for restful nights after a day exploring Route 62.

Standard Double Room

Karoo Rose

Charming and romantic, with warm earthy tones and curated Karoo touches.

Deluxe Queen Room

Spekboom Suite

Bright and elegant with generous space and modern finishes.

Family Room

Protea

Spacious and welcoming, ideal for families or small groups.

Luxury King Room

Namaqua

A bold and stylish room with handcrafted furnishings and luxe finishes.

Standard Twin Room

Blue Crane

Bright, simple, and peaceful with a natural palette inspired by the Karoo sky.

Wheelchair-Friendly Room

Rooibos

Designed with accessibility in mind, combining practicality with boutique charm.

Wheelchair-Friendly Room

Fynbos

Fully accessible yet stylish, with custom décor and thoughtful touches.

Luxury Suite

Honeybush

A spacious, indulgent suite with a private sitting area and refined décor.

Standard Double

Olive Grove

Serene and earthy, styled with olive tones and Karoo-inspired textures.

Premium King Room

Karoo Sky

A guest favorite, designed for ultimate comfort with sweeping Karoo views.

Vintage Car Restaurant

Step into a retro-styled dining experience. The Vintage Car Restaurant serves hearty breakfasts, leisurely lunches, and elegant dinners — all with a Karoo twist. Fresh, locally sourced ingredients paired with warm hospitality make every meal unforgettable.

Menu Highlights

Karoo Lamb Shank

Slow-braised with rosemary and red wine

Cape Seafood Platter

Fresh catch with lemon butter sauce

Artisan Cheese Board

Local cheeses with preserves and nuts

Wine Boutique

Celebrate the region's winemaking heritage at our boutique wine corner. Hand-picked selections from the Cape Winelands and beyond are available for tasting or to take home. Each bottle tells a story of South African terroir and craftsmanship.

Upcoming Events

From live music evenings to seasonal celebrations, Barrydale Karoo Lodge is more than a stay — it's an experience. Discover what's happening during your visit.

MusicOctober 15, 2025

Live Jazz Under the Stars

Join us for an enchanting evening of smooth jazz performed by local musicians. Enjoy cocktails from the Windpomp Bar as the sun sets over the Karoo. Limited seating available.

Wine & FoodOctober 22, 2025

Karoo Wine Tasting Evening

Discover the finest wines from the Cape Winelands with our sommelier-guided tasting. Paired with artisanal cheeses and local delicacies. Reservations required.

FestivalNovember 5, 2025

Route 62 Heritage Festival

Celebrate the rich cultural heritage of Route 62 with traditional music, local crafts, and authentic Karoo cuisine. A family-friendly event showcasing the best of Barrydale.
